synopsis.text: Kanade Kohinata is a musical prodigy who has lost her creative inspiration. Her childhood friend Ritsu Kisaragi convinces Kanade and his younger brother Kyouya to transfer to the prestigious Seiso Academy, home of a nationally competitive orchestra club. As Kanade joins the club in preparing for the National Music Competition, she rediscovers her passion for music. Surrounded by talented musicians who push her to improve her skills, Kanade also finds inspiration in new friendships and rivalries. This coming-of-age story explores the bonds that develop through dedication to a common goal, as Kanade and her fellow club members pour their youthful energy into creating unforgettable summertime memories. With music and relationships intertwined, they may even discover romance blossoming alongside their art.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
